title: Cruise booking confirmations and voyage contracts
dataVerified: Passenger names, cabin number, cruise line, itinerary, dates, fare, booking ref
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake cruise bookings. Domain binding verifies cruise line. Prepaid fare verification. Liability documentation (Athens Convention). Cancellation policy evidence. Multi-page: Cruise contracts multi-page with terms.
